title: EastEnders' Danny Walters teases explosive Christmas Day episode amid Keanu's affair
text:

EastEnders star Danny Walters says this Christmas Day will be an explosive one in Albert Square.

The actor says things will soon come crashing down for his character Keanu Taylor amid his affair with Sharon Mitchell.

After getting away with it for a while, Danny says Keanu will soon be found out after getting Sharon pregnant behind husband Phil Mitchell's back, and it'll make for an explosive festive episode of the BBC soap.

During an exclusive chat with Mirror Online at the Inside Soap Awards, Danny said: "It’s going to explosive, like classic Christmas Day.

"There’s a lot of involvement of Keanu and Sheanu storyline. And it’s been going for a while, the Sheen storyline and you see different elements to the relationship - when he’s been tied to the bed with pink fluffy handcuffs and you’ve seen him when he’s tied to a warehouse, threatened to kill him.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Getty Images)

"So yeah, there’s been different elements and it’s been a rollercoaster ride. But as we know, at some point it will be revealed. And when it does get revealed, it’s going to have such a massive impact on the Square on Keanu and Sharon and Louise and Phil and so many characters. So the repercussions are humungous."

The episode is set to be packed with twists and turns and could be as thrilling for viewers as last year's videotape reveal of Stacey and Max's affair.

Danny told us: "I don’t know who it’s going to be revealed but it’s going to be a very smart, clever… it might not be obvious, it could be something very subtle."

(Image: BBC / Kieron McCarron)

The 26-year-old says Keanu should watch his back, and that he can definitely see someone getting hurt - or even killed - on the show this Christmas.

He said: "I think he’s been, for a while, having eyes in the back of his head. Personally, I’ve been training a lot in the gym just in case!

"It’s hard to say [if there will be a death] because I can’t say. But it’s… you would have thought that there is going to be some damage. There’s got to be some repercussions for the storyline."

description: EXCLUSIVE: The actor says fans can expect a classic Christmas Day episode with plenty of twists and turns as his character's affair is revealed
